In the olden days, your pronouns were assumed. Girls were girls and men were men. People weren't compelled to tell you which they thought they were. An eyeball test was enough. But that was the bygone era of 2019. Now, one is expected to volunteer their pronouns if one wants to stay in the good graces of the internet. Even though, a majority of people think it's all silly. It would appear the feline community hasn't gotten the memo, either.
title: Enjoy this cat slapping the virtue signaling out of their human's mouth when she declares her pronouns
